title: WTB Raw T206s in VG condition
author: sgbernard

posts.post_title: WTB Raw T206s in VG condition
posts.post_content:
Hi folks,

I'm about 35 cards into a collector grade raw T206 set. I'm looking to buy raw cards in equivalent to PSA 2-4 (G-VG/EX) condition, and I'd be happy to buy bulk.  Front image is what matters most, back damage is ok if it's not horrible. I'm not right now collecting rare backs, but I'm willing to listen. I need just about everything at the moment, so don't be afraid to ask if you're looking to unload!

email is best: sethgbernard @ gmail.com

Thanks and happy new year,
Seth
Bump, up to about half the set, still happy to pick up small lots!

You are making great progress, Seth!

Cheers, Mike

Thanks, Mike! I'm only trying to keep up with your pace, as always ;)

(By the way, how many do you have left?)
